titleStmt.title: 1874 October 24: To the Secretary of the Auckland Institute.

sourceDesc.p: Letters in Auckland Museum Library ref MS-76.
encoded into TEI by Melissa Bryant, 4.11.15

correspAction.name: the Secretary of the Auckland Institute

front.p: To The Secretary of the Auckland Institute, Napier, October 24th 1874.
Letters in Auckland Museum Library ref MS-76.

body.p: The Secretary of the Auckland Institute,

We have recently succeeded in forming a branch Philosophical Institute here, and as we wish to imitate those older branches in the larger Provinces—at all events in our Rules & Regulations,—I have the honour to request that you will please to send me a copy of the Rules of your Institute to lay before our Council at their next Meeting, which will be held shortly:—and am
